HeroSection: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
WhoWeAreContent1: An academy for education and training to devote the Arab identity to non-native speakers.
WhoWeAreContent2: It is an institution that works to teach non-Arabic speaking students to teach them the Arabic language, whatever their religion.
WhoWeAreContent3: Field trips for non-native speakers to practically instill Arabic culture.
WithUsContent: you will find what you want. If the student is not a Muslim, he will enjoy it because he will coexist in our atmosphere of a family nature, and the curricula offered to him will differ from the curricula of the student of an Islamic character. Of course, your request is with us, educational pleasure, and high and proven strategies, in addition to providing job and training opportunities for teachers who seek to develop themselves.
OurHistoryContent: History is not the past but a map of the past, drawn from a particular point of view, to be useful to the modern traveller.
2015: Our academic career started from this year
2017: We officially started working after hiring Ms. Amnah Al-Sayed Visiting Doctor at the University of Islamabad
2021: We established the academy under the name of Amnah Arabic Academy
2023: We developed ourselves and the academy, and it became under the name of Dhad Academy.
ContactUsContent: You can contact us any way that is convenient for you. We are available 24/7 via email. You can also use a quick contact form below or visit our academy personally.
